channel.title: Comments on: Buckling under the strain of several million Google News Alerts

item.title: By: Rachel
item.dc:creator: Rachel
item.content:encoded:
it bothers me that VW’s buzz will inevitably lead to their demise, seeing as they are genuinely talented, no matter how superficial and gimmicky they are presented. Listen to “I Stand Corrected” or “Cape Cod Kwassa Kwassa” and tell me you arent having fun.

They did a fantastic job producing their new album and i think it pushed their popularity out of the realm of absurdity.

As my parents have always told me, “I’m not going to ask you to finish everything on your plate, but take a few bites, and if you dont like it, you never have to have it again.”

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: Yeah, they were definitely 2007's Clap Your Hands Say Yeah. I was hesitant (read: embarrassed) to list them in my top 10, but I did listen to the shit out of the record last year. But, much like CYHSY, the novelty wears off after a while. Then again, isn't that the point of pop? Like FruitStripes gum, it is.
item.content:encoded: Yeah, they were definitely 2007’s Clap Your Hands Say Yeah. I was hesitant (read: embarrassed) to list them in my top 10, but I did listen to the shit out of the record last year. But, much like CYHSY, the novelty wears off after a while. Then again, isn’t that the point of pop? Like FruitStripes gum, it is.
